text: Frederic Anthony Rzewski ( ; April 13, 1938 â€“ June 26, 2021) was an American composer and pianist. He was known for adding political themes onto his music. His best known works were Coming Together and the piano versions of The People United Will Never Be Defeated!. He was born in Westfield, Massachusetts. Rzewski died on June 26, 2021 at the age of 83.Gramophone - The American composer and pianist Frederic Rzewski has died ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American composers Category:American pianists Category:Musicians from Massachusetts
title: Frederic Rzewski
